intro: Gunners, to the ready! Now, blockward ho!
description:
Ready yer cannon and blast yer way to 2048! Match, merge, and fire across th’ high seas in Blocks Ahoy!

In this explosive cube-shootin’ adventure, ye’ll launch and match blocks to merge ‘em into bigger numbers. Unleash massive combos and beware—if yer blocks reach the shore, it’s game over mate!

- Shoot ‘n merge blocks to hit 2048!
- Explosive combos 'n satisfyin' chain reactions! 
- Score big ‘n climb the leaderboard!
- Play on a bright, tropical pirate island!
- Touch controls make it easy ‘n fun to fire away!

Be ye the greatest shooter dis island needs?
